  • Constructor Details

    • Line

      public Line(int x, int y, int x2, int y2, Color colour)
      Creates a line object with set coordinates and colour
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate of start of line
      y - y coordinate of start of line
      x2 - x coordinate of end of line
      y2 - y coordinate of end of line
      colour - colour of line
